name: Add a new row to Google Sheets from a new task in Everhour
description:
This template adds a new row to a Google Sheets spreadsheet as soon as a new task is created in Everhour.

The template works with [this sample Google Sheets spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1_98Df191136uUuMnLyAAGDxvQ274rt9tswF8IUSkbX8/edit#gid=0) You can make a copy of it for testing purposes.
